title: 论国际服和网易国服的好处和坏处
author: PixelDDD
txt_content:
本帖最后由 PixelDDD 于 2020-3-17 16:12 编辑 

论国际服和网易国服的好处和坏处
例子是 Hypixel
我个人发现一个事
为什么我国服比国际服裸连还卡？
为什么下午3点左右服崩到凌晨？
我沒有水帖
我承认我是香港人
因为有人看不懂简体字233 所以我机翻+人工翻译了
On the advantages and disadvantages of international server and Netease National server
For example, Hypixel.
I found one thing.
Why my ping in Netease National Server is higher than international server and i didn't use any VPN in international server.
Why the server crash from 15:00 to midnight
I didn't send any Meaningless theme
I admit I'm from Hong Kong
抱歉英语不好
